events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but received the wrong size and would like a refund as soon as possible.
The customer has requested a refund due to receiving a wrong size item, categorising this under refund.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. for processing the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you received in the wrong size.
Could you please provide your order number and if possible a photo of the jacket you received, so we can verify and proceed?
Sure, my order number is 7845123. I've attached a photo showing the size tag which is definitely not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the jacket at no cost.
I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label offer. This solution works well for me, thank you!
The refund process has been initiated and return label sent. Please send the jacket back at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to confirm if you were able to return the jacket and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been closed successfully. Your refund has been processed and we appreciate your business.
